remarks: Linearity property that will be used for inner product.  TODO: try to combine hypotheses in hdmap*ln* series.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapln1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapln1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapln1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapln1.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
hdmapln1.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmapln1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapln1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmapln1.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` R ) $.
hdmapln1.m $e |- .X. = ( .r ` R ) $.
hdmapln1.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapln1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapln1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmapln1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmapln1.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
hdmapln1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
hdmapln1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` Z ) ` ( ( A .x. X ) .+ Y ) ) = ( ( A .X. ( ( S ` Z ) ` X ) ) .+^ ( ( S ` Z ) ` Y ) ) ) $.
